remarks.para: This class will not throw exceptions in the Export method. All exceptions will be driven through the event.
Implementers of derived classes should make sure that this export exception mechanism is continued. As this method is likely to be called on seperate threads.

member.name: Create
member.returns: A valid instance of an Exporter.
member.exception: All of the parameters are required so provided a null reference will cause this exception please see the parameter name in the exception for more information.

member.name: Export
member.returns: The name of the rendered XML file
member.remarks: This method captures exceptions during imort of single items and records the details in the property. Errors here will not halt an export.
